channel.title: Client or server?
channel.description: I started playing a server and recently a new client was added which has a uid. but when i logged onto play my account was level 3 and it appeared as though i had been reset. but when i actually looked there was an Èinfront of my name. The È is not in the client when i go to log in so does anybody have any idea what i can do? perhaps something to do with the new uid.

item.title: Client or server?
item.dc:creator: @TOKSICK TOKSICK
item.description:
@TOKSICK wrote:

tell the owner/coder there is a bug in the client

Read full topic
